/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering power lines, adding a touch of nature and urbanity to the landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The image is captured from a low angle, emphasizing the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
